<<<<<<< HEAD
A Letter to Leiutenant [sic] Collonel Iohn Lilburn now prisoner in the Tower.
8 p.
Printed by Henry Hills, and are to be sold at the sign of Sir John Old-castle, in Py-corner, London, : 1653.
Caption title. Imprint from colophon. Annotation on Thomason copy: "Sept. 8". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
